__e: He left me everything when he died.
Last, as we refuse a share in the inheritance, which is easy, as you're leaving us nothing, for this, too, we're owed something.
With my inheritance of Aunt Emily, I could've lived here with my children with my head high again.
Years ago, my father decreed that his heir to the family throne must be strong enough to kill his own brother in battle if necessary.
The only means to support my mother and brothers was my father's legacy:
Now that Oliver has ascended to his position as heir to the Demon, he will come for me, with as many men as it takes to see me dead.
His marriage is, in fact, a condition of his inheritance.
Something I was unable to do as an heir.
And I see no reason to believe that you and your legacy won't be well taken care of when the sale goes through.
This is the Zhao child, isn't it?
Just burn through the kids' inheritance in one fell swoop.
Yeah. it's not like I'm trying to save the witch heritage or anything.
She only married the old man to get to his inheritance and that's normal.
All I've done is work to protect your legacy.
Only when there's an inheritance the children pretend to be nice.
Not exactly, except that my husband is the last heir.
You know, I got to thank you all ... for helping me understand what my heritage is.
I don't care about an inheritance, I care about you.
